headline: Vistra Corp. (VST) Is Experiencing A Trend That “Has Not Happened Since The 90s,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Recently Talked About In His “Idea-Driven” Market. Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is a sizable American electricity company whose shares have gained 28% year-to-date. The stock has benefited primarily from investor interest in AI and the expected increase […]

headline: 2 Undervalued High-Yield Sectors With Huge Tailwinds (Top Picks)
summary: Diversification builds stability in dividend portfolios, but sector overweights can enhance returns. See why these two high-yield sectors and top picks stand out.
